definitions.definition: An abnormal deficiency in the concentration of oxygen in the blood , be it the partial pressure of oxygen (mm Hg), the content of oxygen (ml oxygen per dl of blood) or the per cent saturation of the blood's hemoglobin , singly or in combination.

main_definition: ( medicine ) An abnormal deficiency in the concentration of oxygen in the blood , be it the partial pressure of oxygen (mm Hg), the content of oxygen (ml oxygen per dl of blood) or the per cent saturation of the blood's hemoglobin , singly or in combination.
